items.name: Replica Altar of the Eternal Hunt
Sethraliss Priest's Pillow
items.source: This would really raise the bar when it comes to home furnishing.

items.name: Grummle Sleeping Bag
items.source: Whether up a mountain or at home, a sleeping bag will make you feel safe and warm.

items.name: Grummle Tent
items.source: A rustic tent made of yak fur and skins that provides excellent protection from the cold.

items.name: Kafa Creamer
items.source: Made from the milk of Kun-Lai yaks, it's lactose free!

items.name: Dalaran Kafa Table
items.source: A sturdy table ideal for placement near seating areas to hold beverages and kafa table books.

items.name: Pandaren Wooden Cart
items.source: A sturdy cart for the transport of goods. Yaks not included.

items.name: Commander's Kafa Mug
items.source: May have "World's Best Commander" engraved on the side.

items.name: Ceramic Kafa Mug
items.source: A plain white mug for enjoying various hot beverages like kafa.

items.name: Dalaran Kafa Grinder
items.source: Used for grinding dried kafa'kota berries in small batch kafa brewing.

items.name: Kafa Press
items.source: A device for brewing kafa from kafa'kota berries. Take the kafa plunge!

items.name: Draconic Metalshaper's Anvil
items.source: Once used to shape metal purely for war, these anvils are now used by dracthyr artisans to make whatever they want.

items.name: Replica Grathardormu's Hammer
items.source: A replica of a legendary hammer once used to swear an oath of vengeance. These replicas are often used by blacksmiths to infuse their craft with a bit of mystique.

items.name: Green Thumb's Watering Can
items.source: It's a watering can. Everyone needs a watering can. Even dracthyr.

items.name: Draconic Auctioneer's Lectern
items.source: A stylish lectern. Tavern tales tell that standing at once of these makes your speech increase in speed threefold.

items.name: Obsidian Warder Pennant
items.source: A banner proudly displaying the symbol of the Obsidian Warder weyrn.

items.name: Dark Talon Pennant
items.source: A banner proudly displaying the symbol of the Dark Talon weyrn.

items.name: Roasted Ram Leg
items.source: It's a succulent roasted leg of ram. Despite this, it is named after the inn of Valdrakken, and not just because it's a roasted leg of ram.

items.name: Draconic Trader's Cart
items.source: A status symbol for some, this stylish cart will let you transport anything smaller than it to wherever you need it to be.

items.name: War Creche Teaching Crystal
items.source: Crystals like these were once used to store Neltharion's teachings for the dracthyr. Not this one, though.

items.name: Ancient Weyrn Device
items.source: An ancient device from one of the dracthyr weyrns. It doesn't work anymore other than making a colorful glow.

items.name: Grummle Bedroll
items.source: A nice bedroll, for rolling in bed.

items.name: Replica Cursed Forge of the Nathrezim
Forbidden Fork
items.source: A fork from the Forbidden Reach. It's not that the fork itself is forbidden. That would be silly.

items.name: Legerdemain Lounge Sign Board
items.source: Great for attracting foot traffic to grand openings or parties.

items.name: Grummle Kafa Refinery
items.source: Used for the bulk refinement of kafa'kota berries into the transcendent brew known as kafa.

items.name: Artisan's Measuring Scales
items.source: Useful for measuring out ingredients or anything else that need weighing. Not recommended for weighing anything larger than a small dog. Or a very large rat.

items.name: Grand Mask of Bwonsamdi, Loa of Graves
Idol of Pa'ku, Master of Winds
Idol of Rezan, Loa of Kings
Warsong Footrest
items.source: A place to zug zug your feet after a long day of zworbu.

items.name: Replica Dark Iron Mole Machine
items.source: Some of the comforts of Shadowforge City can be found wherever else you call home.

items.name: Small Mask of Bwonsamdi, Loa of Graves
Relaxing Goblin Beach Chair with Cup Gripper
Five Dawns Shrine of the Smoking Fish
Stolen Copy of the Blood Ledger
Silver Hand Tribute to the Fallen
Open Tome of the Dragon's Dedication
Replica Altar of Light and Shadow
Replica Words of Wind and Earth
Open Sack of Roasted Kafa
items.source: A sack of roasted kafa'kota berries, opened and ready for brewing.

items.name: Sealed Sack of Roasted Kafa
items.source: These kafa'kota berries have been dried, roasted, and sealed for freshness.

items.name: Dalaran Espresso Machine
items.source: Brews a concentrated kafa rich with flavor. Espresso yourself!

items.name: Thalassian Chest
items.source: A typical chest found in Silvermoon.

items.name: Carved Idol of Nalorakk, Loa of War
"Isolation" Unframed Painting
items.source: A canvas painting, purchased directly from the artist.

items.name: "Autumnal Eversong" Unframed Painting
items.source: A canvas painting, purchased directly from the artist.

items.name: "Brunch and a Book" Painting
items.source: A framed painting by the artists of Silvermoon.

items.name: "Autumnal Eversong" Painting
items.source: A framed painting by the artists of Silvermoon.

items.name: "Reclamation" Painting
items.source: A framed painting by the artists of Silvermoon.

items.name: Carved Idol of Jan'alai, Loa of Fire
Carved Idol of Halazzi, Loa of the Hunt
Artisanal Display Tent
items.source: A tent that functions as a decorative element to anything placed in it. It also functions as a tent, if you need it for that.

items.name: Eversong Crystal Glass
items.source: When one must drink wine, one should do so with only the finest eversong crystal.

items.name: 590 Quel'Lithien Red
items.source: Some bottles of wine are for drinking, other bottles of wine are for showing off to people what you could have been drinking if you opened it. This is the former.

items.name: "Silvermoon in Summer" Painting
items.source: A framed painting by the artists of Silvermoon.

items.name: "Eversong in Bloom" Painting
items.source: A framed painting by the artists of Silvermoon.

items.name: "Isolation" Painting
items.source: A framed painting by the artists of Silvermoon.

items.name: "The Light Blooms" Painting
items.source: A framed painting by the artists of Silvermoon.

items.name: Astalor's Hookah
items.source: The same type of hookah found in Astalor's Sanctum. Comes with a card that says "With my compliments - A".

items.name: 590 Quel'Lithien Red Display Bottle
items.source: Some bottles of wine are for drinking, other bottles of wine are for showing off to people what you could have been drinking if you opened it. This is the latter.

items.name: Thalassian Academy Dictation Device
items.source: For when one has just the most incredible thoughts, and simply can't pick up a pen with which to write them down. Or taking notes in university while not paying attention to the lecturer.

items.name: Safety Electrical Cabling
items.source: Built to the highest safety standard, but still shouldn't be touched.

items.name: Blue-Glo Lantern
items.source: Glows with the delightful light of pure electricity.

items.name: Z-205 Mechanical Device
items.source: So mechanical you can use it for anything, so long as it's mechanical.

items.name: Galvanic Storage and Maintenance Device
items.source: Throw something in here and it comes out good as new! Or close to good as new. Better than it was before at least. Not worse at any rate. Probably.

items.name: Mad Science Blueprints
items.source: Why even bother with science if it's not mad science?

items.name: Mechagon Control Console
items.source: Has every lever you could possibly need to control something.

items.name: Mechanical Gauge
items.source: Useful for measuring things.

items.name: Miniature Charging Station
items.source: All the juice of a regular charging station, in a smaller package.

items.name: Ineffective Mechanical Privacy Screen
items.source: Not good for it's original purpose, but very good for hanging things on.

items.name: Peon's Work Bucket
items.source: Work is da... you know.

items.name: Sin'dorei Wine Display
items.source: Some bottles of wine are for drinking, other bottles of wine are for showing off to people what you could have been drinking if you opened it. This is the later but dialed up to the nines.

items.name: "Nature's Strength" Painting
items.source: A framed painting by the artists of Silvermoon.

items.name: Tale of the Penultimate Lich King
Pylon Fragment
items.source: This shattered piece was a part of Tortheldrin's extensive pylon system used to contain the powerful demon Immol'thar. There might be somewhere to display this in the Arcantina.

items.name: "The Light Blooms" Unframed Painting
items.source: A canvas painting, purchased directly from the artist.

items.name: Sin'dorei Artisan's Easel
items.source: Ready for any painting, novice and master alike.

items.name: "The Last Day of the Semester" Painting
items.source: A framed painting by the artists of Silvermoon.

items.name: "A Bridge Over Calm Waters" Painting
items.source: A framed painting by the artists of Silvermoon.

items.name: "Family Portrait" Painting
items.source: A framed painting by the artists of Silvermoon.

items.name: "Brunch and a Book" Unframed Painting
items.source: A canvas painting, purchased directly from the artist.

items.name: "River's Protectors" Unframed Painting
items.source: A canvas painting, purchased directly from the artist.

items.name: "The Fallen Protectors" Unframed Painting
items.source: A canvas painting, purchased directly from the artist.

items.name: "Reclamation" Unframed Painting
items.source: A canvas painting, purchased directly from the artist.

items.name: "The Fallen Protectors" Painting
items.source: A framed painting by the artists of Silvermoon.

items.name: "River's Protectors" Painting
items.source: A framed painting by the artists of Silvermoon.

items.name: Fresh Canvas
items.source: A blank canvas purchased from an artist's supply.

items.name: Tall Corked Bottle of Liquid Mystery
Short Corked Bottle of Liquid Mystery
Visage of Akil'zon, Loa of Victory
Visage of Jan'alai, Loa of Fire
Hearthlight Armillary
items.source: An impressive device capable of manipulating ambient light within and around its owner's house, either to dim or enhance it.
